name: Greek lamb kebabs
ingredientsContent:
• 1 kg Leg of lamb; deboned
  • 3 Tspn Fresh parsely; chopped
  • 1 Tspn oreganum; dried
  • 100 ml extra virgin olive oil
  • 50 ml fresh lemon juice
  • 1 Tspn grated lemon rind
  • 5 Cloves garlic; minced
  • 1 pinch Maldon salt & black pepper
  • 1 tspn sugar
instructions: Soak wooden skewers in water while you prepare.  Cut the lamb into large bite size pieces of about 4 cm cubed and place in a bowl.  Mix all the marinade ingredients together and whisk or stir to combine well.  Pour over the meat, mix around to cover each piece, cover with cling film and allow to marinade for 1 – 2 hours.  Thread the pieces onto the skewers and braai.

name: Ahi Tuna, Blackened with Soy Mustard Sauce and Beurre Blanc (Boom)
ingredientsContent:
• For the soy-mustard Sauce:
  • 0.25 cup mustard powder; preferably Colman's
  • 2 tablespoons hot water
  • 2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar
  • 0.25 cup soy sauce
  • 1 For the beurre blanc:
  • 1 tablespoon shallots; finely minced
  • 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar
  • 7 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice
  • 7 tablespoons dry vermouth
  • 0.5 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter; chopped
  • 1 Salt
  • 1 Freshly ground white pepper
  • For the blackening spice:
  • 7 tablespoons paprika
  • 0.5 tablespoon cayenne pepper
  • 0.5 tablespoon pure chile powder
  • 0.25 tablespoon freshly ground white pepper
  • 0.5 tablespoon ground sandalwood (optional)
  • For the tuna:
  • 8 inches thick and 5 inches long
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 0.75 cup warm Beurre Blanc
  • For the garnish:
  • 2 tablespoons pink pickled ginger
  • 1 ounce daikon sprouts
  • 0.5 tablespoon black sesame seeds; toasted
instructions:
Make the soy-mustard sauce
1. Mix the mustard powder and hot water together in a cup to form a paste. Let sit for a few minutes to allow the flavor and heat to develop. Add the vinegar and soy sauce, mix together, and pass through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to develop.
Make the beurre blanc
1. Combine the vinegar, lemon juice, vermouth and shallot in a heavy stainless steel saucepan. Cook rapidly over high heat until the liquid has almost all evaporated, about 1 to 2 minutes.
2. Add the cream and cook over medium heat until the mixture has reduced and thickened slightly, 1 to 2 minutes.  Remove the pan from the heat and set aside until you are ready to serve the sauce.
3.  Just before serving, place the sauce in the top of a double boiler over hot, not boiling water.  Add the butter and salt and white pepper, whisk just until butter has melted.  Serve immediately.
Make the ahi
1. Mix all of the blackening spice ingredients together on a plate. Dredge the ahi in the spice mixture on all sides.
2. Heat the olive oil in a nonstick skillet over high heat and sear the ahi for 15 to 30 seconds on each side for rare, 1 minute on each side for medium-rare, or to the desired doneness. Remove the ahi and cut into 20 thin slices.
3. For each serving, arrange 5 slices of ahi in a fan, pinwheel, or cross shape on the plate. Spoon or drizzle a little of the Soy-Mustard Sauce around the tuna, and then spoon or drizzle the Beurre Blanc around.
4. To garnish, arrange a small mound of the pickled ginger next to the fish and top with the daikon sprouts. Sprinkle the sesame seeds over the Soy-Mustard Sauce.

name: Lemon Garlic Tilapia
ingredientsContent:
• 4 each Tilapia fillets
  • 3 Tablespoons fresh lemon juice; use 3 cut and squeezed lemons if hounding have juice
  • 1 Tablespoon butter; melt the butter
  • 1 clove Garlic; finely chopped
  • 1 teaspoon Parsley flakes
  • Pepper; to taste
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray a baking dish with nonstick cooking spray or rub butter on the surface of the dish. 
2. Rinse tilapia fillets with cold water and pat dry with paper towels. 
3. Place fillets in baking dish. Pour lemon juice over fillets, then drizzle butter on top. Sprinkle garlic, parsley and pepper. 
4. Bake in preheated oven until the fish is white and flakes when pulled apart with a fork. Time anywhere between 20-30 mins.

name: Santa Fe Quesadilla Pie
ingredientsContent:
• 3 cups Chicken; cooked and shredded
  • 1 (15 oz.) can Black beans; rinsed and drained well
  • 1 (14.5 oz.) can Diced tomatoes; drained well
  • 2 Green onions; minced
  • 1 (10 oz.) tub Santa Fe Cooking Creme; (Philly makes this)
  • 3 (6 inch) Flour tortillas
  • 3/4 cup Mexican blend cheese; shredded
instructions:
1)  Preheat oven to 375(F) degrees.  Combine the first 5 ingredients in a large bowl; mix lightly until combined.
2)  Spoon 1/4 of chicken mixture on the bottom of a 9 inch pie plate or round baking dish; top with a tortilla.  Then layer another 1/4 of chicken mixture and 1/4 c. shredded cheese.  Cover with another tortilla, another 1/4 of chicken mixture, 1/4 c. cheese, and remaining tortilla.  Top with remaining 1/4 of chicken mixture, remaining 1/4 c. cheese; cover with foil.
3)  Bake 20 minutes, remove foil and cook an additional 10 minutes or until completely bubbly and golden brown.  Remove and let stand (if you can handle it) for 5 to 10 minutes; slices hold together a bit nicer that way.

name: Turkey Empanadas Grande
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Pound Ground turkey
  • 1 Clove Garlic; minced
  • 1 Cup Onion; chopped
  • 1/2 Cup green pepper; seeded and chopped
  • 2 Cups Tomatoes; chopped
  • 1 Tablespoon Dried parsley
  • 1 Teaspoon dried cilantro
  • 1 Teaspoon Cumin
  • 1/2 Teaspoon Oregano
  • 1/2 Teaspoon Red pepper flakes
  • 1/8 Teaspoon Black pepper
  • 1 15-oz package refrigerated pie crusts
  • 1 egg white; beaten
  • 1 avocado; peeled and sliced
  • 1/4 sweet red onion; thinly sliced
instructions:
1. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saute turkey, garlic, onion, and green pepper until turkey is no longer pink in center.
   2. Stir in tomatoes, parsley, cilantro, cumin, oregano, red pepper flakes, and black pepper. Stirring occasionally, cook over medium heat about 15 minutes or until most the liquid is reduced.
   3. Spray cookie sheet with non-stick oil. Unfold one pie crust in center of cookie sheet. Carefully spread one half of turkey mixture to within 1-inch of one-half pie crust.
   4. Brush 1 inch of pie crust with egg white. Encase turkey by folding other half of pie crust over turkey. Using a fork, press edges of crust together and pierce top of crust to make holes to allow steam to escape.
   5. Repeat steps 4 and 5 with remaining ingredients and pie crust. Bake at 400 degrees F. 20 to 25 minutes.
   6. To serve, cut each empanada into 4 wedges. Garnish with avocado, red onion and cilantro.

name: Fillet with Maple Balsamic Wine Sauce
ingredientsContent:
• 500 grams Tenderloin; cut slices around
  • 100 grams Red Wine
  • 100 grams Aceto Balsamico
  • 30 grams Maple Syrup
  • 2 tsp Salt
  • 1 tsp Black Pepper
  • 60 grams Butter
  • 2 tsp Corn Starch
instructions:
In a already hot cast iron deep skillet add 30g of butter wait to melt add the red wine, balsamico and maple syrup, leave it boiling at the medium heat until it reduce around 20%, place aside.
In the same skillet add another 30g of butter, add the steaks of tenderloin already salted, leave it fries for around 3 minutes each side, then take it out and slice in thin cutting, around 1 cm each slice. Bring the slices back to skillet to give a slightly fried in a single side. IMPORTANT. Be careful on this stage, don't let to fried too much, try to keep it medium done.
Lastly add back the sauce into the skillet let it heat and add slowly the corn starch until gets thicker and add black pepper as your taste.
Place the slice of steak in a plate and add the sauce on...You are done, hope you enjoy it.
Thanks

name: Oven-Fried Pork Chops
ingredientsList: pork loin chops, 1/2 inch thick (1 to 1-1/2 lb)
frozen roasted russet potato pieces package(20 oz)
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Egg
  • 2 tbsp Lowfat Milk
  • 1 cup Corn bread stuffing mix, packaged
  • 4 pork loin chops, 1/2 inch thick (1 to 1-1/2 lb)
  • 1 Frozen roasted Russet potato pieces package(20 oz)
instructions:
Directions
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
Meanwhile, in a shallow dish, beat egg with a fork; stir in milk. Place dry stuffing mix in another shallow dish. Trim fat from chops. Dip pork chops into egg mixture. Coat both sides with stuffing mix. Arrange pork chops in a single layer in one side of a 15x10x1-inch baking pan. Add potato pieces to the other side of the same pan, mounding potatoes as needed to fit.
Bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until pork is done (160 degrees F) and potatoes are lightly browned and crisp, turning pork and stirring potatoes once. Makes 4 servings.

name: Calypso Pork Chops
ingredientsContent:
• 6 boneless pork chops; about 4 ounces each
  • 1 cup Chicken broth
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
  • 2 tablespoons dark rum; (optional)
  • 2 tablespoon Lime juice
  • 2 tablespoons Brown sugar
  • 1 clove Garlic; minced
  • 1/2 teaspoon Salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon Ground ginger
  • 1/4 teaspoon Ground nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon Ground cloves
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a self-sealing plastic bag; seal bag and refrigerate for 4-24 hours. Remove chops from marinade; discarding leftover marinade. Grill chops quickly over indirect heat in covered grill about 10-12 minutes, turning once to brown both sides.

name: Pasta Puttanesca
ingredientsContent:
• Balsamic vinegar
  • 1 ts Herbs de province
  • 1 lg Onion; minced
  • 1 can tomatoes; (large) chopped
  • salt and pepper; to taste
  • 2 tb Capers
  • 1 Cloves garlic; minces
  • 1/2 bunch fresh basil; Chopped
  • 1/4 ts Red pepper flakes
  • 1 tb kalamata olives; Minced
instructions: "Saut=82" onions and garlic in balsamic vinegar and water, till  translucent. Add capers and olives (if youre using them). Continue cooking  for another couple of minutes until things are nicely blended.    Add everything but the salt and pepper. Turn down heat and simmer 10  minutes. Serve over a hearty pasta like linguine.    Posted to fatfree digest V96 #251    From: Denise K Pliskin     Date: Tue, 10 Sep 1996 11:46:18 -0800 (pst)

name: Turkey Salad in Sesame Pitas
ingredientsContent:
• 2 Cups COOKED TURKEY; cut into 1/4-inch cubes
  • 1 Cup Celery; diced
  • 1 Cup seedless grapes; halves
  • 1/2 Cup sunflower seeds; toasted
  • 1/4 Cup non-fat mayonnaise
  • 1/4 Cup non-fat plain yogurt
  • 2 Tablespoons tahini; (sesame seed paste)
  • 1/2 Teaspoon Salt
  • 1/2 Teaspoon Pepper
  • 4 Leaves lettuce; cleaned and chilled
  • 4 8" diameter sesame pita breads
instructions:
1. In medium bowl combine turkey, celery, grape halves and sunflower seeds.
   2. In small bowl combine mayonnaise, yogurt, tahini, salt, and pepper. Fold dressing into turkey mixture. Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
   3. To serve, cut 3/4 inch from top of pita and line pita with lettuce leaf. Fill with 1 cup turkey salad.

name: Crock Pot Balsamic Chicken
ingredientsContent:
• 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon dried basil
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon pepper
  • 2 teaspoons minced onion; dried
  • 4 Garlic cloves; minced
  • 1 tablespoons Extra virgin olive oil
  • 1/2 cup Balsamic Vinegar
  • 8 chicken thighs; boneless, skinless
  • sprinkle of fresh chopped parsley
instructions: Combine the first five dry spices in a small bowl and spread over chicken on both sides. Set aside. Pour olive oil and garlic on the bottom of the crock pot. Place chicken on top. Pour balsamic vinegar over the chicken. Cover and cook on high for 4 hours. Sprinkle with fresh parsley on top to serve.

name: Chicken, Mushrooms, and Peppers Pasta
ingredientsContent:
• 1 box Mezze Penne
  • 2 tablespoons Kosher Salt
  • 3 tablespoons Gourmet Garden Basil Paste; or 3 Tablespoons Fresh
  • 1 tablespoon Gourmet Garden Parsley Paste; or 1 Tablespoon Fresh
  • 1 teaspoon Herbs De Provances
  • 0.5 teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes
  • 8 cloves Garlic; Minced
  • 0.5 cup Sliced Red Peppers
  • 2 Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts; cut into bite size pieces
  • 0.5 cup Mushrooms; Freshly sliced
  • 0.25 cup Extra Virgin Olive Oil
  • 0.75 cup Red Onion; Minced
  • Salt and Pepper; to taste
  • 0.25 cup Pasta Water
instructions:
Prepare pasta as directed on box with the 2 Tablespoons of Kosher Salt in water. Save a 1/4 Cup of the pasta water for later.
In a large Saucepan add EVOO heat to Low/Med. Add onions and cook until translucent. Then, add Garlic, Basil, Parsley, Herbs De Provance, Red Pepper Flakes, and Salt and Pepper to taste. Combine and cook for 1 minute. 
Add Chicken in bite sized pieces and brown.
After Chicken is browned add in Peppers and fresh Mushrooms. Add Pasta Water. Combine well then cover and cook until chicken is completely cooked through. 
Combine with Pasta ans serve.

name: Steakhouse Rib-Eye's (with carmelized onions and mushrooms)
ingredientsContent:
• 2 Rib Eye steaks; 1 1/12 to 2 1/12 inch's thick
  • 1 whole White onion; Sliced
  • 1 package Mushrooms; Sliced
  • 3 Cloves Garlic; Finely minced
  • Butter
  • Olive oil
instructions:
When picking out your steaks do NOT be afraid to be picky, good marbling is essential to a flavorful and juicy steak, if you can find a butcher who dry ages this will greatly increase the flavor and tenderness of the steak. Its important to get steaks that are roughly the same size and thickness so they cook the same, 1 ½ to 2 inches is the perfect thickness. 
The first important trick to cooking the perfect steak is allowing the meat to come to room temp before cooking. This will ensure the center is cooked to desired doneness without having to over cook the outside. Simply Take your steaks, splash a little olive oil on them, season with sea salt (if you want a herb taste add a little fresh rosemary sprig and remove before cooking) and wrap in plastic wrap and leave on your kitchen counter for a couple hours before cooking. 
On the Grill: Clean and pre-heat your grill, once grill is hot (around 325 degrees) place steaks on grill over heat. DO NOT BE IMPATIENT, let steaks cook with out turning them until you start to see a little blood on the top side of the steaks (you can rotate steaks half way to give them the nice cross hatched grill marks), once you see the blood start to well up on top its time to flip them over and let the other side cook. There are many ways to tell when the steaks are done but I don’t like to use thermometers that require you to pierce the steak. It is VERY IMPORTANT not to pierce the steaks in any way until you are ready to eat them, this ensures the juices stay in the steak. 
On the Stove: You will need a 12 inch iron skillet (properly seasoned) to cook them on the stove top. Preheat skillet until nice and hot. Once hot, place steaks in skillet and cook until you start to see the juices well up on the top side of the steak (do not turn until you see the juices, you want to create a nice charred crust on the steak). Once you see the juices welling up on top flip steaks and let cook until they have reached your desired doneness. 
After steaks have cooked take them off the heat, place them on a serving dish and set aside to allow them to cool slightly, Letting the steaks rest is very important and allows the juices to settle within the steak. 
In the same skillet (or a non stick pan if preferred) splash a little olive oil in the pan and start caramelizing the onions and mushrooms. Once the mushrooms and onions have been cooked go ahead and cover the steaks with them. In the same pan you cooked the Mushrooms and onions melt down about 3 or 4 tablespoons of butter and add the garlic to the butter about a minute or 2 before its fully melted and then pour over the steaks and enjoy.

name: Jodie's Homemade Macaroni and Cheese
ingredientsContent:
• 1 box penne pasta
  • 3/4 lbs sharp cheddar cheese; shredded
  • 1/2 lbs gruyere cheese; shredded
  • 1/2 cups asiago cheese; shredded (or parmesan)
  • 3 tablespoons unsalted butter
  • 3 tablespoons flour
  • 2 cups milk
  • 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/8 teaspoon Cayenne pepper
instructions:
Heat oven to 350(F).  coat a 2 quart baking dish with nonstick spray.
Cook penne according to directions on package.
In large bowl, mix cheddar, gruyere, and asiago.  Set aside.
Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium heat.  Whisk in flour until smooth and slightly bubbly.  In a thin stream, whisk in milk.  Stir in onion powder, salt and cayenne.  Bring to boil over medium-high heat.  Reduce heat and simmer 3 minutes.  Remove from heat; whisk in 2-1/2 cups of cheese mixture.
In pasta pot, stir together pasta and cheese sauce.  Pour half into prepared baking dish.  Sprinkle with cup of cheese.  Spoon remaining penne into dish and top with remaining cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes.  Increase oven to broil and cook an additional 3 minutes until slightly browned.

name: Traditional Spaghetti And  Meatballs
ingredientsContent:
• 4 sl white bread
  • 1/2 c Skim milk
  • 2 lg egg whites
  • 8 oz Ground turkey
  • 8 oz ground beef, extra-lean
  • 4 tb Romano cheese; grated
  • 1 tb fresh basil; minced, or 1 tsp. dried basil
  • 1 ts fresh oregano; minced, or 1/2 tsp. dried oregano
  • 1/2 ts Salt
  • 1/4 ts Pepper
  • 4 oz Tomato Sauce; Canned
  • 1 ts vegetable oil; divided
instructions: 1 Put the bread into a medium mixing bowl and pour the milk over it. Let sit 5minutes. Add the egg whites, ground turkey, ground beef, Romano cheese, basil,oregano, salt and pepper. Knead the mixture with your hands until it is smooth.To prevent sticking, dip your hands into cool water before forming eachmeatball. Form mixture into 30 1 1/2-inch balls.	2 Pour the tomato sauce intoa large, heavy-bottom saucepan and bring to a simmer over low heat. Warm 1/2teaspoon vegetable oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add half the meatballs tothe skillet and brown them on all sides.	3 Spoon the meatballs into the tomatosauce. Add the remaining 1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil to the skillet and brown therest of the meatballs, then add them to the sauce. Simmer, stirring, for 20minutes.	4 While sauce is simmering, prepare pasta according to packagedirections; drain. Transfer to a large serving bowl. Remove bay leaves fromsauce; pour sauce over pasta and serve.	Servings: 6 Nutrition FactsServing size: 1 serving						Amount Per Serving				Calories		 762.00				% Daily Value		Total Fat 16.00g		24%		Cholesterol 0.00mg		0%		Sodium480.00mg		20%		Percent daily values based on a 2000 caloriediet.		Carbohydrates 110.00g	36%		Nutrition information provided by therecipe author.		Protein 43.00g		86%	Recipe By: RecipeSecrets.com

name: Creamy Fettuccini Alfredo
ingredientsContent:
• 1/2 c milk
  • 8 oz Fettuccini; cooked, drained
  • 3/4 c Parmesan; Grated
  • 1 8-oz pk cream cheese
  • 1/2 c Margarine
instructions: In large saucepan, combine cream cheese, Parmesan, margarine and milk; stir  over low heat until smooth. Add fettuccini, toss lightly. Try adding shrimp  or chicken.    busted by sooz    Recipe by: Key Gourmet    Posted to recipelu-digest by sooz  on Mar 25, 1998

name: Pastichio (Greek Lasagna)
ingredientsContent:
• Meat Layer Ingredients
  • 1 tablespoon Butter
  • 1 Finely chopped onion
  • 3 pounds Ground beef; Lean
  • 6 ounces Tomato paste
  • 1 teaspoons Sea Salt
  • 1 teaspoons Ground allspice
  • 1 teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
  • 1 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
  • 2 Eggs; beaten
  • Macaroni Layer
  • 1 pound uncooked Ziti
  • 2 Eggs; beaten
  • 1/2 cup butter; melted
  • Bechamel Layer Indgredients
  • 4 cups whole milk; scalded
  • 1 cup All purpose flour
  • 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese grated
  • 1/2 cup butter
  • 3 Egg yolks; beaten
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon Ground white pepper
instructions:
1.Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in onion and cook until it begins to soften, about 3 minutes. Stir in the ground beef, and cook until crumbly and no longer pink. Pour in the water and tomato paste. Season with salt, pepper, allspice, nutmeg, and cinnamon; cover, and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat, adjust salt to taste, then refrigerate until cold. Once cold, remove any congealed fat, and thoroughly mix with 2 beaten eggs, and set aside. 
2.Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 
3.Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain, and rinse under cold water to cool. Mix the macaroni in 2 beaten eggs until well coated. 
4.Evenly spread half of the macaroni mixture into a 11x14x2 inch baking pan, sprinkle with 1/2 cup of the grated parmesan cheese, and drizzle with 1/2 cup of melted butter. Spread the meat mixture overtop, then finish with the remaining macaroni. Sprinkle the macaroni with another 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, and drizzle with 1/2 cup of melted butter. 
5.While pasta is cooking, prepare Bechamel.  Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat, using whisk, slowly incorporating flour.Once flour has been incorporated, slowly add hot milk while shitring constantlly to avoid sticking & burning. Once thickened to mashed potato stage, remove from heat, add parmesan eggs, nutmeg and pepper. 
6. Layer 1/2 of pasta in 9"x11" pan. Add ground beef mixture and spread evenly. Layer remaining noodles. Spread bechamel sauce evenly on top layer, about 1/2-3/4" thick layer. Cover and bake for 15-20 min. Remove cover and continue baking until golden brown 5-10 min.

name: Simple and tasty tuna salad
ingredientsContent:
• 12 Oz Albacore tuna in water
  • 4-5 Each Scallions; Thinly sliced
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Mayonnaise; I like Dukes
instructions: Flake tuna in medium bowl.  Add scallions. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and mix.  Add about 1/4 cup mayo, just enough to make it a consistency you like.  Some times I toast half a bagel, layer with tuna tomato and cheddar and broil until melted. Or serve on hearty wheat toast with lettuce and tomato.

name: Fresh Vegetable and Herb Quiche
ingredientsContent:
• 2 cups cooked long-grain rice
  • 1 egg, lightly beaten
  • 3/4 cup shredded swiss cheese
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • cooking spray
  • 1 cup chopped fresh broccoli floweret
  • 1 cup chopped fresh cauliflower
  • 1/2 cup shredded carrot
  • 2 Eggs; lightly beaten
  • 3/4 cup evaporated skim milk
  • 1/4 cup water
  • 1 teaspoon thyme
  • 1 teaspoon oregano
  • 1/4 teaspoon pepper
instructions:
Combine cooked rice, 1 egg, 1/4 cup cheese, and 1/4 tsp salt in a small bowl; stir well.  Press mixture into a 9-inch pie plate coated with cooking spray.  Bake at 350 for 5 min.
Place chopped broccoli and cauliflower in a vegetable steamer over boiling water; cover and steam 5 min or until crisp-tender.  Drain.
Arrange broccoli, cauliflower, and carrot in rice shell.  Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese.
Combine remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 eggs, and next 5 ingredients in a small bowl, stir well; pour over cheese.  Bake at 375(F) for 40 min or until set.  Let stand 5 min.  Serve warm.

name: Bacon & Spinach Tortellini
ingredientsContent:
• 6 pieces bacon
  • 1 package cheese tortellini
  • 1 tablespoon pine nuts -optional, but delicious
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 3 cloves garlic -minced
  • 2 cups fresh; baby spinach
  • 1/2 cup grated parmesan
  • 1/4 teaspoon pepper
instructions:
1)  Microwave bacon between 10 paper towels (5 layers on each side) for 5 - 6 minutes.  Crumble and set aside.
2)  Cook tortellini according to package; drain.  Transfer to a large bowl.
3)  Heat a large skillet over medium heat.  Add pine nuts to pan; cook 1 1/2 minutes until toasted - stirring occasionally.  Add nuts to bowl of pasta.
4)  Heat olive oil in the same skillet over low heat.  Add garlic and saute 1 minute.  Add spinach to pan.  Cook for 2 minutes or until spinach wilts.  Add to bowl.
5)  Add to bowl; parmesan, pepper, and crumbled bacon.  Toss well and serve.

name: Pizza
ingredientsContent:
• -- Dough --
  • 6 ounces Water; (up to 7 ounces)
  • 3/4 teaspoon Salt
  • 2 tablespoon olive oil
  • 2 1/2 cups All purpose flour
  • 4 tablespoon Honey
  • 1 3/4 teaspoons Active dry yeast
  • -- Toppings --
  • 1 cup spaghetti sauce
  • 1 cup Mozzerella cheese; shredded
  • 1 4-oz can Mushrooms stems and pieces
  • 1/3 cup Onions; chopped
  • 1/2 cup Green pepper; chopped
instructions:
Combine all ingredients in order listed into breadmaker pan. Start on dough setting.
When complete, pat dough into 12 inch round pizza pan. Let stand for 10 minutes. Preheat oven to 400 F. Spread pizza sauce over dough. Sprinkle toppings over sauce. Bake 15-20 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

name: Brigitte Sealings Sausage Pasta Supper
ingredientsContent:
• 1 lb Turkey sausage; cut in bite size pieces
  • 3 tb Margarine
  • 1/4 c Parmesan cheese
  • 1/4 c Onions; chopped
  • 1/2 lb Mushrooms; sliced
  • 2 c Vegetables; canned or frozen
  • 1/4 c bell peppers; Chopped
  • 1 ts Oregano
instructions: Heat margarine in a baking dish. Saute onions and  peppers and mushrooms. Add vegetables and sausage.  Heat well and season with seasonings. Stir in cheese.  Serve over noodles with additional parmesan cheese.

name: Dry-Cured Sopressata
ingredientsContent:
• 10 lbs. lean pork
  • 9 tbsp. salt
  • 1 oz. powdered dextrose
  • 2 tbsp. whole black pepper
  • 2 tbsp. ground black pepper
  • 3 ozs. corn syrup solids
  • 2 level tsp. Prague powder No. 2
  • 1 tbsp. hot cayenne pepper
instructions:
Grind all meat through 1/2" or 3/4" grinder plate.  Add all ingredients and mix well.  Remove meat to tub container, packing meat tightly (not over 6-7" high) and refrigerate for 48 hours.  Remove from cooler, grind meat through 1/4" plate and stuff into hog middle 8-10" long. Sausage then is held for 48 hours at about 55 degrees F. and then is placed into smokehouse.  Sausage is smoked for 48 hours with cold smoke until color is obtained.  Remove from smokehouse and keep at 50-60 degrees F. with humidity around 70-80%.  Hold about 8-10weeks.  Product will be ready when it loses about 30% of its green weight.
This recipe is for 10 lbs. of meat and calls for 2 level tsp. of nitrate.  Adjust accordingly.

name: Vereniki Cassarole
ingredientsContent:
• 10-12 potatoes,; cooked & mashed
  • 2 onions; diced
  • 1 stick butter
  • Lasagna noodles; cooked
  • 16 oz. can sauerkraut; drained & rinsed
  • Salt & Pepper
instructions:
Cook onions in butter until soft. Put 1/3 in the potatoes.
Add half the sauerkraut to the potatoes. 
Salt and pepper to taste. 
Put noodles in the bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. 
Put 1/2 the potato mixture; then noodles; then other 1/2 potatoes then noodles.
Add rest of onion and butter to other half of sauerkraut and pour over noodles. 
Cover with foil. 
Let heat through 30-40 minutes at 300 degrees.

name: Italian Herb Bruschetta Chicken
ingredientsContent:
• 2 large boneless skinless chicken breasts; halved horizontally to make 4 fillets
  • 3 teaspoons Italian seasoning*
  • 2 teaspoons minced garlic
  • salt; to taste
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil (for cooking)
  • For the Topping:
  • 4 roma tomatoes; finely chopped
  • 1/4 red onion; finely chopped (or 3 cloves finely chopped garlic)
  • 4 tablespoons shredded fresh basil
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • salt; to taste
  • 1/2 cup freshly shaved parmesan cheese
  • Balsamic Glaze:
  • 1/2 cup balsamic vinegar
  • 2 teaspoons brown sugar (OPTIONAL)
instructions:
See original recipe: https://cafedelites.com/2017/... 
                                        
                                            
                                                For preparation instructions, visit the link above. Why not here? Read our Pledge to Food Bloggers.
